text: Philip Eric Rene Jansen (born January 1967) is a British businessman. He has been the chief executive officer (CEO) of BT since 1 February 2019. He also became CEO of Worldpay on 30 April 2013. On 12 March 2020, during the 2019â€“20 coronavirus pandemic, Jansen was diagnosed with COVID-19. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:British chief executives
title: Philip Jansen
